mapper.select: SELECT p.PAY_NO , p.REQUESTER , p.PRICE , p.PAY_DT , p.CONTRACT_NO , c.PROPOSAL_NO FROM pay p JOIN contract c ON c.CONTRACT_NO = p.CONTRACT_NO WHERE PAY_NO = #{payNo}

SELECT u.users_name as usersName , c.WORKER_ACCOUNT as workerAccount , c.WORKER_BANKCODE as workerBankcode , d.PRICE as price , d.CONTRACT_DETAIL_NO as contractDetailNo FROM contract c JOIN users u ON u.users_no = c.worker_info JOIN contract_detail d ON d.contract_no = c.contract_no JOIN pay p ON c.contract_no = p.contract_no WHERE d.PAYMENT_DT = TO_DATE(sysdate, 'YY/MM/dd') AND d.PAYMENT_TF = 'N'
